player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    The class representing players in the game.
    Author:
    nbi21

        private int numPets
        The number of pets a player owns

      • accountBalance

        private int accountBalance
        Amount of in game currency the player possesses. This is determined by the number of pets a player owns and the number of days the game spans

      • finalScore

        private int finalScore
        The player's final score for the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              int numPets,
              int numDays)
        Constructor for the player class. Sets the initial accountBalance for the player based off their daily allowance, how many pets they have and how many days the game spans.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player.
        numPets - The number of pets the player owns.
        numDays - The number of days the game is played for.

      • chargeAccount

        public boolean chargeAccount(int amount)
        If the player has sufficient funds, returns true and charges the account of the player by an amount, reducing their balance. Else returns false to indicate that the transaction has failed.
        Parameters:
        amount - The int amount the player's account balance is charged.
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the transaction was successful.

      • calculateFinalScore

        public int calculateFinalScore()
        Computes the final score of the player as an average of the scores of the pets a player owns. Updates finalScore to this value so it can be displayed on the end screen.
        Returns:
        The player's score as an int.
